plugin.name: Teak's Tweaks
error.not_player: &cYou must be a player to use this command!
error.not_op: &cYou must be an operator to use this command!
error.missing_command_permission: &cYou do not have permission to use this command!
error.missing_permission: &cYou do not have permission to do that!
error.cant_get_latest_version: &cCould not get the latest version of Teak's Tweaks!
error.command_disabled: &cThis command has been disabled by a server administrator!
alts.error.no_permission_list_others: &cYou do not have permission to see other's alts!
alts.error.no_permission_modify_others: &cYou do not have permission to modify other's alts!
alts.error.self: &cYou cannot add yourself as an alt!
alts.error.whitelisted: &cYou cannot add a whitelisted player as an alt!
back.error.on_cooldown: &cYou must wait %cooldown_seconds% seconds between uses of /back!
back.error.no_back_location: &cYou have nowhere to go back to!
